<meta name="node_id" content="694661" />
<meta name="description" content="The WESO Trends 2025 report provides an in-depth analysis of global labour market trends, highlighting the impacts of slowing economic recovery, persistent youth unemployment, and gender disparities. It examines the structural challenges facing workers worldwide and offers insights into regional and global patterns shaping the future of work." />
<link rel="canonical" href="https://www.ilo.org/publications/flagship-reports/world-employment-and-social-outlook-trends-2025" />

<meta property="og:title" content="World Employment and Social Outlook: Trends 2025" />
<meta property="og:description" content="The WESO Trends 2025 report provides an in-depth analysis of global labour market trends, highlighting the impacts of slowing economic recovery, persistent youth unemployment, and gender disparities. It examines the structural challenges facing workers worldwide and offers insights into regional and global patterns shaping the future of work." />
<meta property="og:image" content="https://www.ilo.org/sites/default/files/2025-01/WESO_Trends_2025_publication-teaser-web_0.png" />

      <main role="main">
      <a id="main-content" tabindex="-1"></a>
      <div class="layout-content">
          <div>
    <div id="block-ilo-content">
  
    
      
  
  
<article  class="node page--right-sidebar publication">
        





<div >
  

<div class="hero  hero__card-justify__offset hero__poster-size__xlarge hero__card-size__xxlarge hero__card-align__bottom hero__card-theme__light hero__card-background__solid">
	<figure class="hero--background">
									<picture class="hero--image">
																										<source srcset="/sites/default/files/styles/hero_basic_mobile/public/2025-01/08_WESO_Trends2025_Hero%20Image_0.png.webp?itok=3yHGPL4l 2x" media="all and (max-width: 414px)">
																																							<source srcset="/sites/default/files/styles/hero_basic_mobile/public/2025-01/08_WESO_Trends2025_Hero%20Image_0.png.webp?itok=3yHGPL4l 1x" media="all and (max-width: 414px)">
																																							<source srcset="/sites/default/files/styles/hero_basic_tablet/public/2025-01/08_WESO_Trends2025_Hero%20Image_0.png.webp?itok=RVm2bWuY 1x" media="all and (min-width: 414px) and (max-width: 1024px)">
																																							<source srcset="/sites/default/files/styles/hero_basic_desktop/public/2025-01/08_WESO_Trends2025_Hero%20Image_0.png.webp?itok=XS9ykmcW 1x" media="all and (min-width: 1024px) and (max-width: 1168px)">
																																		<img class="ilo--card--image" src="/sites/default/files/styles/hero_basic_desktop/public/2025-01/08_WESO_Trends2025_Hero%20Image_0.png.webp?itok=XS9ykmcW" alt=""  loading="eager" >
				</picture>
						</figure>
		<div class="hero--card-offset"></div>
	<div class="hero--card">
		<div class="ilo--hero-card ilo--hero-card__theme__light ilo--hero-card__background__solid  ilo--hero-card__cornercut ">
      <p class="ilo--hero-card--eyebrow">ILO Flagship report</p>
             <h1 class="ilo--hero-card--title">World Employment and Social Outlook: Trends 2025</h2>
            <p class="ilo--hero-card--intro">The WESO Trends 2025 report provides an in-depth analysis of global labour market trends, highlighting the impacts of slowing economic recovery, persistent youth unemployment, and gender disparities. It examines the structural challenges facing workers worldwide and offers insights into regional and global patterns shaping the future of work.</p>
          
<div class="ilo--social-media ilo--social-media__theme__light ilo--social-media__justify__start">
        <ul class="ilo--social-media--list ilo--social-media--list__size__normal">
                                            <li class="ilo--social-media--list--item">
                <a class="ilo--social-media--list--item--icon ilo--social-media--list--item--icon__facebook" href="https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https://www.ilo.org/publications/flagship-reports/world-employment-and-social-outlook-trends-2025" title="Facebook" target="_blank">
                    Facebook
                </a>
            </li>
                                            <li class="ilo--social-media--list--item">
                <a class="ilo--social-media--list--item--icon ilo--social-media--list--item--icon__x" href="https://x.com/intent/tweet?url=https://www.ilo.org/publications/flagship-reports/world-employment-and-social-outlook-trends-2025" title="X" target="_blank">
                    X
                </a>
            </li>
                                            <li class="ilo--social-media--list--item">
                <a class="ilo--social-media--list--item--icon ilo--social-media--list--item--icon__linkedin" href="https://www.linkedin.com/shareArticle?mini=true&amp;url=https://www.ilo.org/publications/flagship-reports/world-employment-and-social-outlook-trends-2025" title="Linkedin" target="_blank">
                    Linkedin
                </a>
            </li>
            </ul>
</div>
  </div>
	</div>
	<div class="hero--caption">
						</div>
</div>
</div>
  
  <div class="container">

	<div class="ilo--card--wrap">

							<div class="ilo--card--area--image">

                      <img class="ilo--card--picture" src="https://www.ilo.org/sites/default/files/styles/cover_image/public/2025-01/Cover_RESEARCH_Flagship_WESOtrends2025_ENG.jpg.webp?itok=_Pw8KZAv" alt="Cover_RESEARCH_Flagship_WESOtrends2025_ENG" >
  </picture>
  					</div>
				</div>

                <li class="ilo--link-list--links--item">
          <a href="https://www.ilo.org/de/resource/news/aufschwung-auf-dem-arbeitsmarkt-verliert-fahrt-%E2%80%93-neuer-bericht-der-ilo" class="ilo--link-list--link">
            <span class="ilo--link-list--label">Pressemitteilung: Aufschwung auf dem Arbeitsmarkt verliert an Fahrt – neuer Bericht der ILO</span>
            <span class="ilo--link-list--icon"></span>
          </a>
        </li>
              </ul>
    </li>
      </ul>
</div>
  </div>
</section>



  
  
  


<section class="component component--theme--whitebg cardgroup component--group--headline  component--publication" >
  <div class="component__container">
                    <h2 class="component__headline">Charts and data</h2>
                          
  

      
    
  
<div class="ilo--cardgroup ilo--cardgroup__count__two ">
	<div class="ilo--cardgroup--inner">
					<div class="ilo--cardgroup--card">
				
  

<div class="ilo--card ilo--card__type__feature ilo--card__theme__light ilo--card__size__standard  ">
	<a class="ilo--card--link" href="/resource/other/world-employment-and-social-outlook-trends-2025-figures" title="Selected charts">
		<span class="ilo--card--link--text">Selected charts</span>
	</a>
	<div class="ilo--card--wrap">
					<div class="ilo--card--image--wrapper">
				  <picture>
